ygData.subject: Re: Factions
ygData.msgSnippet: Pansa, You know me as Aelyn the ranger but I also have a dark elf warrior. Faction is very tough to improve. I have killed enough orcs to allow myself freedom
ygData.messageBody:
Pansa,

You know me as Aelyn the ranger but I also have a dark elf warrior.
Faction is very tough to improve. I have killed enough orcs to allow myself
freedom to move around in freeport.

But what you are trying to overcome is not simply faction, it is racial
hatred. It is noble of you to try and overcome the basic mistrust and
hatred that the Feir'dal have for the Tier'dal, but I know of no way you
could reverse that basic hatred all wood elves have for dark elves.



-----Original Message-----
From: Mallachyte@... <Mallachyte@...>
To: warriors_eq@onelist.com <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, June 11, 1999 6:07 PM
Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Factions


>From: Mallachyte@...
>
>While we are on factions, I have a non-warrior related request for
everyone.
>As another character, I play a Dark Elf Shadow Knight. Again, on the
Bertoxx
>server. I left Neriak at level 3, and traveled to the land of Faydwer. I
>got an invis, and ran to CB cave, hopping to raise my faction enough to
allow
>me into the city. Alas, I am now level 12, and I have recently been
informed
>that I can NEVER change the faction with the elves. Somewhat upset, I
>arranged for an invis to the dwarven lands, in hopes of acceptance there.
>But, as the time for my departure drew near, I ambandoned leaving, refusing
>to belive nothing could be done. So, I decided to start a petition of
sorts
>to help change this. So, what I propose is that they allow me to change my
>faction standings, just make it take a while. I know humans are not looked
>upon as the greatest of friends to the elves, so let's say that it takes
200
>orc kills for them to go from one fac level to the next. So, make if 400
>orcs for me to go from one to the next. Or maybe more like 600. Make it
>hard, but not impossable. Anyway, I ask you to sent them feedback asking
for
>this, because I would like to be able to walk outside without a guard
walking
>by and killing me.
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>What do lizards and rock music have in common?
>http://www.onelist.com
>They both have communities at ONElist. Find yours today!
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>For the Honor and Glory of the Warlord, Rallos Zek!
